tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CustomerComplaints (
  complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  complaint_description TEXT,
  resolution TEXT,
  date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id INT,
    resolution_date DATE,
    resolution_description TEXT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_complaint_id FOREIGN KEY (complaint_id) REFERENCES complaints(complaint_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerComplaints (
  complaint_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  complaint_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
)

CREATE TABLE CustomerDetails (
  customer_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  contact_number VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL,
  address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ComplaintResolution (
  resolution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  complaint_id INT NOT NULL,
  resolution_text TEXT NOT NULL,
  resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ComplaintStatus (
  status_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  complaint_id INT NOT NULL,
  status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  update_date TIMESTAMP
)
